de.sub.goobi.forms

Class CalendarForm.IssueController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.sub.goobi.forms.CalendarForm.IssueController
  • Enclosing class:
    CalendarForm

    public class CalendarForm.IssueController
extends Object
    The class IssueController backs the control elements that are necessary to manage the properties of an issue using Faces, including the option of its deletion.
    Author:
    Matthias Ronge <matthias.ronge@zeutschel.de>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int index
      The field index holds a consecutive index representing its position in the list of issues held by the block.
      protected Issue issue
      The field issue holds the issue that is managed by this controller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected IssueController(Issue issue, int index)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteClick()
      The method deleteClick() deletes the issue wrapped by this controller from the set of issues held by the block currently showing.
      String getColour()
      The method getColour() returns a colour representative for optically distinguishing the given issue as read-only property "colour".
      boolean getFriday()
      The function getFriday() returns whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Fridays as read-write property "friday".
      String getHeading()
      The function getHeading() returns the issue’s name as read-write property "heading".
      protected Issue getIssue()
      The function getIssue() returns the issue held by this controller.
      boolean getMonday()
      The function getMonday() returns whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Mondays as read-write property "monday".
      boolean getSaturday()
      The function getSaturday() returns whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Saturdays as read-write property "saturday".
      boolean getSunday()
      The function getSunday() returns whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Sundays as read-write property "sunday".
      boolean getThursday()
      The function getThursday() returns whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Thursdays as read-write property "thursday".
      boolean getTuesday()
      The function getTuesday() returns whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Tuesdays as read-write property "tuesday".
      boolean getWednesday()
      The function getWednesday() returns whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Wednesdays as read-write property "wednesday".
      void setFriday(boolean appears)
      The method setFriday() will be called by Faces to store a new value of the read-write property "friday" which represents whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Fridays.
      void setHeading(String heading)
      The method setMonday() will be called by Faces to store a new value of the read-write property "heading" which represents the issue’s name.
      void setMonday(boolean appears)
      The method setMonday() will be called by Faces to store a new value of the read-write property "monday" which represents whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Mondays.
      void setSaturday(boolean appears)
      The method setSaturday() will be called by Faces to store a new value of the read-write property "saturday" which represents whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Saturdays.
      void setSunday(boolean appears)
      The method setSunday() will be called by Faces to store a new value of the read-write property "sunday" which represents whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Sundays.
      void setThursday(boolean appears)
      The method setThursday() will be called by Faces to store a new value of the read-write property "thursday" which represents whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Thursdays.

      The method setTuesday() will be called by Faces to store a new value of the read-write property "tuesday" which represents whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Tuesdays.

      The method setWednesday() will be called by Faces to store a new value of the read-write property "wednesday" which represents whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Wednesdays.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IssueController

        protected IssueController(Issue issue,
                          int index)
        Constructor. Creates a new IssueController for the given issue and sets its index value.
        Parameters:
        issue - Issue that shall be managed by this controller
        index - consecutive index of the issue in the block

    • Method Detail

      • deleteClick

        public void deleteClick()
        The method deleteClick() deletes the issue wrapped by this controller from the set of issues held by the block currently showing.

      • getColour

        public String getColour()
        The method getColour() returns a colour representative for optically distinguishing the given issue as read-only property "colour".
        Returns:
        the HTML colour code of the issue

      • getFriday

        public boolean getFriday()
        The function getFriday() returns whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Fridays as read-write property "friday".
        Returns:
        whether the issue appears on Fridays

      • getHeading

        public String getHeading()
        The function getHeading() returns the issue’s name as read-write property "heading".
        Returns:
        the issue’s name

        The function getIssue() returns the issue held by this controller.

      • setFriday

        public void setFriday(boolean appears)
        The method setFriday() will be called by Faces to store a new value of the read-write property "friday" which represents whether the issue held by this controller regularly appears on Fridays.
        Parameters:
        appears - whether the issue appears on Fridays

      • setHeading

        public void setHeading(String heading)
        The method setMonday() will be called by Faces to store a new value of the read-write property "heading" which represents the issue’s name.
        Parameters:
        heading - heading to be used
